justification: Vendor mentions 'high-fidelity 3D rendering by leveraging cloud computing' and real-time streaming to devices but does not explicitly state support for point cloud data or mention LiDAR and other scanning technologies. Interfaces note REST APIs and game engine integrations, but no direct reference to point cloud handling or user-friendly interaction with such datasets.
ability: The ability to render 3D visualizations from point cloud data sets generated by LiDAR and other scanning technologies
